title: Two Easter Games with downloadable Chibis
body:
Hello!

I wanted to share two html5 games I made, one of them last year and one just finished about an hour ago:


http://cubehero.deviantart.com/art/GAME-LoL-Runeterran-Easter-524999184


http://cubehero.deviantart.com/art/GAME-LoL-Ionian-Easter-Rerelease-524998760

These took a ton of effort to make, so I hope you like them!

replies.body: These are fantastically charming.  I like in particular how relaxing the Ionian Easter game is - the birds and wind sounds, with that interpretation of the League music, is really chill.  Haven't managed to find all the eggs on either of them, but happy to see that Sona is in both :D

Thanks a lot!
That bird sound sample is really nice indeed, I love it too. I think my brother (who made the music for Ionian Easter) was pretty happy about your comment on the music!

Sona is my favourite champion, so there's no way I'd leave her out of these! :D

Thanks again ~~and I hope you showed these to a few of your colleagues ehehe~~!

Runterra: Done!
Ionia: Here I come!

EDIT: Ionia complete!

These are amazing!
Thank you, glad you like them!

question, as a game art student, what was the program or method that you centered the scripting/programming around?

but very fun easy, and stunning work.

I made them using Construct 2 by Scirra, you should definitely check it out! My experience with it is very positive so far.

Thanks!
Its cool to find them all but i'm quite sad that there isn't that many yordles aside from kennen in the ionian one..I really wanted to see a chibi gnar ;w;

There's a Lulu in Runeterra!

Also, I tried to sketch a Gnar chibi for you:
http://imgur.com/A2m9wC9
Awhh...thats adorable. Thanks so much, I feel like I can never get enough of the cute little guy. {{champion:150}}
You're welcome!

I absolutely adore these sort of games! And the art is fantastic, I think I found all of the eggs on both of them. Is the ending for the Ionian one a poro? And did you do a chibi version of all of the characters? And did you create the chibis? They're adorable!

Thank you!
You get a poro for finishing Ionian Easter, and 3 bonus chibis for finishing the other one.
I can't really make chibi versions of all the characters, there are way too many! But yes, I created the ones that are featured in both games.

Glad you like it!
You must be really talented at drawing then! And if you don't mind, could you draw a Rek'Sai chibi for me? I really want one. You don't HAVE to make it but it would be nice!

I don't normally do requests anymore, but here:

http://imgur.com/hxoQNOe

She's really weird to try to make a chibi of!
Thank you so much! I always wanted a Rek'Sai chibi and now my dream is a reality because of you! Thanks :D
No problem!
These were both very pleasant experiences, great job on them and the artwork, and thank you! :)
Thank you very much!

These were fun :)

The perspective you implemented through the use of the three layers is very effective and interesting.

 I did notice however that a few of the elements in the runeterra game seemed to activate while i was simply panning across the screen. by that I mean i found lulu banana soraka and oriana without actually clicking on their specific eggs but just by getting lucky by clicking on a particular spot on the game screen. just giving you a heads up ;)

like i said though i had quite a bit of fun doing this, the music elements and sound bytes are well implemented and fun to hear.

great job, wish I had these kinds of skills.

Thank you!

Yes, I'm aware of that, but not sure how to properly prevent it from happening.
Although Banana Soraka and Lulu actually have no eggs, they are a bonus for completing the game along with Popstahri!

Thanks again! 
And if you practice somewhat continually you will be able to do something like this yourself! If you're interested
I would definitely suggest checking out Construct 2, which is what I made these games on. As game engines go, it's relatively easy
to use and not too limited in what you can do with it!
